title: As a BOC Admin, I want Intl Ama merging logic updated
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is signed in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a drug test profile is merged with an **UNREGISTERED** EBIS profile
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS should take the drug test profile as master
BUT WHEN a drug test profile is merged with a **REGISTERED** EBIS profile
THEN EBIS should take the registered profile as master
BUT WHEN an IPL profile is merged with an EBIS profile
THEN EBIS should take the IPL player as master
BUT WHEN two registered profiles are merged
THEN EBIS should take the profile with the higher ID as the master

title: As a BOC TX Admin, I want PTBNL AA label to update the Transaction Payment Tracker
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is signed in as a BOC TX Admin
custom_steps: WHEN an attachment with the Label of PTBNL Assignment Agreement is attached to the Outright (Trade)
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding entry on the Transaction Payments Tracker will have the PTBNL AA column flipped from No to Yes (displays as Green checkmark)

title: As a AMT BOC Admin, I want to delete a check in from a player's history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is signed in as an AMT BOC Admin
AND has the ability to delete check-ins through the UI
custom_steps: WHEN a BOC AMT Admin is viewing a player's Check In History on the player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a trash can icon on each row
AND the trash can icon will appear to the far right of the table (to the right of Location Comments)
AND clicking the icon will prompt the user to confirm their action:
** Title: Warning
** Body: Are you sure you want to delete this check in?  This is a permanent action and cannot be undone
** Buttons: Continue, Cancel
AND clicking Cancel will dismiss the modal
BUT clicking Continue will delete the check in and re-calculate the player's days total for the appropriate club / check in period

title: As a BOC Admin, I want MN players on Rehab to be auto-returned when Reinstate from Injured List is Approved
custom_preconds:
Related to, which covered MJ Players: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1414|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1414|smart-link]

GIVEN a user is signed in as a BOC Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN a minor league player is on a rehab assignment 
AND has a Reinstate from IL transaction submitted and approved
custom_expected:
THEN the system will automatically create and approve a Return from Rehab transaction for the player
AND both transactions will appear in the player's history
AND the player will appear as fully active and no longer on the IL or on Rehab

title: As an Intl Admin, I want updates made to accommdate new Trainers coming from IPL
custom_steps:
#  Remove the Create New button on the Trainers/Agents widget
## Also disable delete functionality from Trainer profiles
# Remove Add New Trainer Links from workflows (i.e. registering new player)
# Update dropdowns and widgets to only display Trainers with an ID >= 10000000

title: As a developer I want to create a table to store viral nation social media report information
custom_steps:
new table will store the following information:

Player Id

Org id of the requesting org (this is the org the player is on at the time of the request)

viral nation report id

safety score from the report

created/updated info

<there may be additional columns added once we have full access to the viral nation API>

title: As a Drug Testing Admin, I want to allow Club users to submit DTRs for 13 year old players
custom_preconds:
Currently, Clubs are not allowed to enter players below the age of 14 or request Drug Tests on them

GIVEN a user is signed in as a Drug Testing Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a club user has the appropriate DTR creation permissions
custom_expected:
THEN clubs will be able to create and submit drug test requests for players that are 13
BUT clubs will not be able to create or submit DTRs for players who are 12 years old or younger

title: As a BOC user I want optioning as a return of substitute player to return the player to their prior option's status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC User
custom_steps: WHEN the Return of Substitute Player checkbox is checked on an option
custom_expected:
THEN upon approval the player should be placed in 'optioned' status if their most recent option was to optioned status OR to optioned w/MLS status if the player's most recent option was optioned with MLS
THEN players who are optioned **PRIOR** to the start of optioned MLS who are recalled as a substitute player and subsequently optioned AFTER the start of optioned MLS will not receive MLS for the time on option
BUT players who are optioned **AFTER** the start of optioned MLS who are recalled as a substitute player and subsequently optioned again will receive MLS for the time on option following the return

title: Update ebis-ui to use OIDC for login
custom_steps: ebis-ui should use the [okta-signing-widget|https://github.com/okta/okta-signin-widget] to perform login against the OIDC app. It should use the {{processCreds}} callback to store credentials for subsequent BO logins.

title: As a MJC Admin, I want clubs reminded to include MJ terms from the player's MN UPC when selecting the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is an MJC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a Selection to Major League Roster transaction is submitted by either Club or BOC
custom_expected:
THEN the system will return the following overridable warning:
** *Title:* Warning
** *Body:* Please ensure that all Major League terms that are included in the player's current Minor League UPC are accounted for when creating the player's Major League UPC.
** *Buttons:* Ok
AND Clicking the Ok button will continue with the submission

title: As an EBIS Admin I want to be able to flag a club affiliate as not having a bam club id
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is an EBIS Admin
custom_steps:
On club affiliates next the BAM Team ID field there will be a checkbox to indicate no BAM Team ID exists for the specified club.

All existing clubs which have a BAM Team ID of 9999 will have this flag checked and their bam team id value set to null.

The bam club id batch will be updated to treat the flag the same way it is currently treating 9999 (ignore a club with that set) - 9999 should no longer be treated differently (same for PIVOTAL-1423: As a developer I want the Club BAM ID Batch to unset old bam ids when an ID is assigned to a new clubQA COMPLETE if done already)

The error message for PIVOTAL-1424: As an EBIS User I want the affiliate profile page to give an error when saving a club with a bam club id that is used by another clubQA COMPLETE (if done already) will be updated to ignore flagged clubs and to once again include 9999 and zero as duplicates
custom_expected:
THEN affiliate profile will have a new checkbox next to the bam team id field to indicate that there is no bam team id
AND if the checkbox is enabled
THEN the bam team id can be entered
BUT if the checkbox is checked
THEN the bam team id is set to null and disabled
AND if the checkbox is checked
THEN the team will not be processed by the bam team id batch
AND if the checkbox is checked
THEN the team will not generate a duplicate (PIVOTAL-1424 must be completed for this to apply)

title: As an EBIS User I want the affiliate profile page to give an error when saving a club with a bam club id that is used by another club
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is an EBIS User
custom_steps: WHEN saving an affiliate from the affiliate profile, if that affiliate's bam_club_id is not null and the 'no bam team id' check box is unchecked
custom_expected:
THEN if the user enters a bam club id for an affiliate which is already in use by another affiliate
THEN the following message is generated for each club with that bam club id:
**“BAM Club Id <###> is already in use for <club name>”  [The club name value should be hyperlink to the club’s affiliate profile]
BUT if the bam club id is NOT used by another club
THEN no error is generated
AND if no bam club id is entered at all
THEN no error will be generated
AND if any other club with the same id is active, the message will be a hard error; Otherwise its a warning

title: As a developer I want the Club BAM ID Batch to unset old bam ids when an ID is assigned to a new club
custom_steps:
When the club BAM ID batch process a club that is missing and ID, it should check to see if that BAM_CLUB_ID is already assigned to an existing club_info record.  If it is, the existing club should have its no bam club id set to true

The email generated when there are failed mappings will be updated to also be sent if this happens.  The subject of the email will be changed from â€œClub BAM ID Batch Results - Unmapped BAM Team IDsâ€� to â€œClub BAM ID Batch Results - for reviewâ€�


There will be two new sections in the email, the first will be titled â€œThe following existing active clubs were marked as having no bam team idâ€� and will display all active clubs that were just flagged as not having an id.  The second will be titled â€œThe following existing inactive marked as having no bam team idâ€� and will list any which were inactive.

AC:

* Club bam ID batch will unset existing club_info records that are tied to a bam club id if that id is associated with a new club.
* If a club is unset, the batch will send an email (or append to the existing email for failures, if those existed)
* The email subject is updated to the above text
* The updated email will list the active clubs which were unset
* The updated email will list the inactive clubs which were unset
* Each section of the results email will be sent when the email goes out (there may not be any failures, inactives, or actives, there can be any combination)
* The email does not get sent if there are NO failures, inactives set to no bam team id, or actives set to no bam team id

title: As a System Admin, I want users told when they need to reset their Inside Password
custom_preconds:
Use Case:
 - When BOC users reset their password, ebis may not be able to log them into BO.  When this happens, they should informed on how to remedy the situation.

GIVEN a user is a System Admin
custom_steps: WHEN trying to print or access the reporting menu (or anywhere else BO is called)
custom_expected:
THEN the system should respond with a 703 status code on BO login
AND the following error message should be returned:
 - *Title:*  Error
 - *Body:*  The system is unable to be log you into the reporting engine.  Please access inside.mlb.com and reset your password to match your OKTA password.  Once this is complete, you may try this action again. Contact ebissupport@mlb.com with any questions."
 - *Buttons:* Back

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see an Additional Text Field added to the Add D
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN looking at the Additional Text Field on the Add D
custom_expected:
THEN it should function the same way as the field on the Add C does
AND it should also print

title: As a BOC Admin, I want players on Rehab to be auto-returned when Reinstate from Injured List is Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a player is on a Rehab assignment and has a Reinstate from IL transaction submitted and approved
custom_expected:
THEN the system will automatically create and approve a Return from Rehab transaction for the player
AND both transactions will appear in the player's history
AND the player will appear as fully active and no longer on the IL or on Rehab

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC User
custom_steps: WHEN a player memo is sent
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
AND deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via WhatsApp
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC User
custom_steps: WHEN a player memo is sent
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS will send the memo to all players via Whatsapp using the MLB Official Contact Info
AND deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download

title: As a developer, I'd like to see build date and commit ids when I hover out click on the Partner League logo so that we can sanity check build and deploy process.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a developer 
AND wants to be able to sanity check build and deploy process
custom_steps: WHEN hovering or clicking on the Partner League logo
custom_expected: THEN the build date and commit ids will be visible [much like EBIS, AMT, and WBC]
